pages.text: A convenient way to store and deploy $(l:brewing/brewing)Cauldron Brews$(/l) and $(l:kettle/kettle_intro)Kettle Brews$(/l). The Brew Bag can hold up to eight stacks of Brews.$(p)The Brew Bag can be dyed by crafting it with any dye.

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: Sneak-use the Brew Bag to open its internal inventory and store the Brews.$(p)Hold right-click and push the mouse towards the direction of a Brew to quickly select it. The Brew will be thrown on release.$(p)Once a Brew has been selected, Sneak to clear the selection.
